value: . French and Algerian specialties Jountchirantikou – Maison “Volvo” Tel: 23.01.25.11

. Directions: All Zemidjans (motorcycle taxis) know La Breche. La Breche is beautifully placed on the top of one of the hills that overlooks the whole valley in which Natitingou sits. They also have a tata somba (traditional 2 story mud fortress built and used by the Ditamaari, a local tribe in this region.) where you can sit on the top story and eat and drink. Service is usually less than reliable, but the food is excellent and the view is amazing.

Grilled Steak with couscous or spaghetti 4.000 f CFA per person (this is a lot of food and it's well presented)
Rabbit and a side 1.300 f CFA
All Sides (couscous, fries, spaghetti) 1.000 f CFA
Full line of beers and soft drinks in large and small, as well as sodabe, the local hard liquor from the south of Benin, and the local millet beer, called tchouk.

value: . Directions: If you are on the Goudrone (main road) going north, after you pass the big round point and the post, you will see a sign for the museum (musee) on the right. If you turn left instead, you will see the beer signs on the fence in front of it. This bar may lack aesthetics, but the service is amazing and it’s located in the very center of town, right down the street from Hotel Tata Somba. This is also a good place to stop if you want to watch Beninese television. The food may take a while, but the family who runs this bar is always more than willing to make your wait as pleasant as possible.

Chicken and a side 1.500 f CFA
Guinea Fowl and a side 1.500 f CFA
A full line of beers and soft drinks are available.

value: This dance club is definitely not at all lacking in aesthetics, but on most days it does lack clients. If you happen to have scheduled your visit at the same time of some local festivities though, then this place will probably be packed. Weekends seem to occasionally attract moderate crowds. This club is available to be rented out as well, though the price is negotiable. Plush couches, mirrored walls, disco lights and a real dance floor all make this club feel like it belongs in Europe. Entry 1.500 f CFA Drinks are usually double the price of an average bar.

Non air-conditioned              Single 10.500 f CFA       Double 13.500 f CFA
Air-conditioned                  Single 15.500 f CFA       Double 18.500 f CFA
Air-conditioned with hot water   Single 25.500 f CFA       Double 22.500 f CFA

African, European, and Asian specialties available

value: content= This hotel hosts the only pool in Natitingou, and it’s lovely. You can also make reservations for the hotels in and around the Park de Pendjari. This includes Hotel de la Pendjari (in the center of the park), Hotel Porga (on the Burkina Faso border next to the park) and Relais de Tanongou (Hotel next to the beautiful waterfalls of Tanongou). Read details for each hotel below.

Air conditioning, TV, and phone 30.000 f CFA
Lunch or diner 6.500 f CFA African and European specialties available.

To get to this hotel you must pay the park entry fee of 10.000 f CFA, and the hotel is in the middle of the park. Also, THIS HOTEL IS ONLY OPEN from late October to mid May***
